name: Detail of Activity - GPS Setout of the gardens and treepits as per the construction drawings.
Record documents - Contractor's site diary and/or photos
Comments - Setout location prior to commencing works.
Detail of Activity - Identify and positively locate services
Minimum Test Frequency - All proposed treepits
Detail of Activity - Remove existing soil to a depth of 400mm
Detail of Activity - Backfill with topsoil 300m
Comments - Plant pit to be dug to twice the width of the rootball
Detail of Activity - Finish when planting is complete
Acceptance Criteria - 100mm Bark Mulch, Forest floor or Fine nuggets
Detail of Activity - Excavate treepits as per layout on drawing
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Comments - Check for multiple services within the construction area.
Detail of Activity - Break up base of tree pit to minimum depth of 300mm
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Detail of Activity - Fill soil to tree pit minimum 750 mm depth: Site won top soil or imported topsoil as per specification, lightly compacted by body weight
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Comments - Clean topsoil to be used
Detail of Activity - 150mm Layer of free drainage gravel
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Comments - At base of tree pits
Detail of Activity - Install 1.5m x 2m Heavy duty Hope tree root barrier membrane if adjacent to surfaces or utility trenches
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Comments - Only required where trees are near existing ducts, manholes or footpaths
Detail of Activity - Import topsoil and plant trees to same level as grown in nursery
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Detail of Activity - 75mm layer bark mulch in Amenity area as specified by the Drawing / Specification
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Detail of Activity - Timber stakes driven to 600mm in ground to even height, 3 stakes per tree paced evenly around tree
Minimum Test Frequency - All tree pits
Acceptance Criteria - All above documentation is shown as attached to this work pack.
Minimum Test Frequency - At completion of construction
Inspection / Test method - Asbuilts to be submitted at the completion of construction, information to be captured
Acceptance Criteria - Asbuilts reviewed and submitted
